title: public servant to whom this Order applies shall stand at the amount at which it
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 

(section 19(4)) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited public service pay pension act 2017 (section 19(4)) order 2021

title: public servant to whom this Order applies shall stand at the amount at which it
heading: 2. This Order applies to a public servant to whom section 19 of the Public
text_raw:
2. This Order applies to a public servant to whom section 19 of the Public 

Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (No. 34 of 2017) applies.
text_norm: 2 order applies public servant section 19 public service pay pension act 2017 (no 34 2017) applies

title: public servant to whom this Order applies shall stand at the amount at which it
heading: 3. On and from 1 July 2021, the annualised amount of the basic salary of a
text_raw:
3. On and from 1 July 2021, the annualised amount of the basic salary of a 
public servant to whom this Order applies shall stand at the amount at which it 
stood immediately before the enactment of section 2 of the No. 2 Act of 2009. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 June, 2021. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th June, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [308] 3
